title: Sibling Advicery: Microaggressions/Stripper Circus
description:
This week Bob and Monét give advice on dealing with microagressions, dressing to impress, and dealing with friendships that feel unbalanced. The two also give advice on navigating intimacy with people living with STIs and pushing back against misogyny in queer spaces.
Go to GreenChef.com/rivalry130 and use code rivalry130 to get $130 off, plus free shipping!
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
